task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 20°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will tilt my view upwards.
I can now see the top and bottom of the building; by counting the floors and estimating the height of each floor, I can calculate the total height.
